response.original_title: Dan Finnerty & the Dan Band: I Am Woman
response.overview: Dan Finnerty is known for his comedic music performances with his band, The Dan Band. They are known for their humorous and often explicit covers of popular songs, typically adding a comedic twist to the lyrics. One of their well-known performances is a cover of "I Am Woman," where they incorporate their trademark humor and profanity into the song.  The Dan Band gained popularity for their appearances in various movies, including "Old School" and "The Hangover," where they performed comically altered versions of songs. Dan Finnerty's raunchy and comedic style has made The Dan Band a unique and entertaining act in the world of music and comedy.
response.title: Dan Finnerty & the Dan Band: I Am Woman
